# generateSignature(from:completionHandler:)

**Type Method**

Creates a signature with the asset you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
class func generateSignature(from asset: AVAsset, completionHandler: @escaping (SHSignature?, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
class func signature(from asset: AVAsset) async throws -> SHSignature
```

## Parameters

- **asset**: An asset that contains the audio to convert.
- **completionHandler**: The system calls this completion block after creating the signature, or an error if the system couldnâ€™t create it.

This block takes the following parameters:



## Discussion



The asset you specify can be any type of media that contains audio tracks. If the asset has multiple tracks, the system mixes them into one [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHSignature].
title: generateSignature(from:completionHandler:)
